name: Super Discreet Kaiju
description:
Super Discreet Kaiju!

You are a monster! But a nice one just trying to drink sweet radioactive juice. Hide from evil helicopters while improving your score!

Made for the GMTK Jam 2018. The idea was to make a stealth game where being stealthy was not really an option.

Controls

Arrow Keys (or WASD) to move.

Left Shift to run.

Credits

We used  Colin Brown's  amazing UI. Link

Thanks also to Increpare, most of our sfxs were made with Bfxr.

Music composed by purple-planet.com

Created by:

  • Victor Oliva
  • Luis Bazan
  • Jorge Luis De Alba
